activity.code:
set('REFUSAL',''); $property_vars = array( 'MYDEST' => '', 'MYBODY' => '', 'REFUSAL' => '', ); //-------------------------------------- // // handling data on the form // //-------------------------------------- // init variables with POST and if POST is empty // init with the property foreach ($property_vars as $prop => $value) { $property_vars[$prop] = get_var($prop,'any',$instance->get($prop)); } //user commands **************** $ActBad = get_var('ActBad','POST',false); $ActGood = get_var('ActGood','POST',false); $ActLater = get_var('ActLater','POST',false); //-------------------------------------- // // handling results from the form // //-------------------------------------- $message = Array(); $checkforstaying = true; if (($ActBad) || ($ActGood) || ($ActLater)) { // saving properties // if they changed foreach ($property_vars as $prop => $value) { if ($value != ($instance->get($prop)) ) { $instance->set($prop,$value); } } if ($ActGood) { $checkforstaying = false; // going to next stage $instance->setNextActivity('Send the message'); //complete and send the message $instance->complete(); } if ($ActBad) { if($property_vars['REFUSAL']=='') { $message[]='You need to complete the REFUSAL to give some explanation of why it is baAad'; } else { $checkforstaying = false; // going to next stage $instance->setNextActivity('Acknowledge user it was bad'); //complete and sen the message $instance->complete(); } } elseif($ActLater) { $checkforstaying = false; //leave without complete() $GLOBALS['workflow']['__leave_activity']=true; } } //now if we do not leave... if ($checkforstaying) { //-------------------------------------- // // showing the form // //-------------------------------------- foreach ($property_vars as $prop => $value) { $template->set_var(array($prop => htmlentities($property_vars[$prop]))); } //some more form vars $template->set_var(array( 'message' => implode('
',$message), ) ); //we want to display the owner $this->display_owner = 1; // submit options we want $this->submit_array['ActBad'] = array(label => 'BaAad', confirm => 'Are you sure you want to reject it?'); $this->submit_array['ActGood'] = array(label => 'GoOod', confirm => 'this will send the email, you really want it, really?'); $this->submit_array['ActLater'] = 'Later, I need more reflexion'; //priority array $this->priority_array = array( 1 => lang('1 - low'), 2 => lang('2 - normal'), 3 => lang('3 - better'), 4 => lang('4 - urgent'), ); } ?>

activity.description: This automatic activity sends an email to people in validator role. This email contains a lot of tips for writing emails with this agent

agent_data.value:
%owner% wanted to send an email to %property_MYDEST%. You need to check the message, the task is avaible %link_userinstance|here on the activity list%. and just to test links I think you should try to click on this %link_http://www.phpgroupware.org/|phpgroupware.org external site link%. or on this %link_/index.php?menuaction=workflow.ui_useractivities.form|local installation link%. And some other usefull links are: %link_viewinstance|the instance in default view mode%. %link_viewniceinstance|the instance in view activity%. %link_admininstance|the instance in admin mode%.
We could as well use some defined tokens: instance name and id: %instance_name% (%instance_id%) activity name and id: %activity_name% (%activity_id%) process name, version and id: %process_name% v%process_version% (%process_id%)

===================================== %signature%
